title: komisariatku
author: komisariatku
created_time: June 05, 2023, 09:56:47 AMLast edit: July 18, 2023, 03:34:35 PM by komisariatku
content: Pragmatic Play is one of the most popular slot providers. Pragmatic play or often called PP Games is famous for having good graphics and high RTP.Many people like PP Games because they can get maxwin x5000 and some even x21,000 [I've never gotten maxwin at sweat bonanza x21,000, maybe it's a myth]. Some of the games that many players play are slots that have a buy free spins featureLet's discuss anything about Pragmatic Play slot games1# What are your favorite slots on PP Games?2# Try to share your biggest wins3# Do you have any special tricks for playing PP?4# How is your experience getting the maxwin and how much money have you spent playing slots?I've got 2x maxwin on bufallo megaways and x4500 on Gates of Olympus. But the winning history is no longer available in my account

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Pragmatic Play is my favorite provider also but bear in mind while I have only managed to get near the max win here (I consider a max win) as I won 9833x out of x10000 max multiplier in FISH EYE slot,the fact is that it took me almost two years to hit the max win in a game that is not directly from them but is in partnership with Reel Kingdom so not easy at all to win it.They remain the best though for me as before I used to play Play n Go slots and never once in three years have I won the max win there.I now only keep playing their slots as they offer another huge benefit,they let you play with IDR as a currency with a really low bet of 0.01-0.02 dollars as a minimum.

comments.author: masulum
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on September 15, 2023, 09:42:50 AMPragmatic Play is my favorite provider also but bear in mind while I have only managed to get near the max win here (I consider a max win) as I won 9833x out of x10000 max multiplier in FISH EYE slot,the fact is that it took me almost two years to hit the max win in a game that is not directly from them but is in partnership with Reel Kingdom so not easy at all to win it.They remain the best though for me as before I used to play Play n Go slots and never once in three years have I won the max win there.I now only keep playing their slots as they offer another huge benefit,they let you play with IDR as a currency with a really low bet of 0.01-0.02 dollars as a minimum.I have never won a jackpot of more than 5000x, you are very lucky to have that experience. The last time I only won Maxwin Fruit Party, and since then I have started to gamble less often. But I agree with you, if PP is mostly giving maxwin to their players, other games I played is rarely provide maxwin, I think PGsoft is the worse. Because while playing PGS, my biggest win was only 600x.

comments.author: komisariatku
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on September 15, 2023, 09:42:50 AMPragmatic Play is my favorite provider also but bear in mind while I have only managed to get near the max win here (I consider a max win) as I won 9833x out of x10000 max multiplier in FISH EYE slot,the fact is that it took me almost two years to hit the max win in a game that is not directly from them but is in partnership with Reel Kingdom so not easy at all to win it.You are very lucky mate. I have never had good results from pragmatic slots that have a maximum win of more than 5000x bet. Do you think the level of difficulty is higher than pragmatic slots which only has a maximum win of 5000x bet? I already got maxwin twice on buffalo king megaways, I really like that slot and play there very often, but after I got the second maxwin, the slot never gave me any big wins, the freespin bonus is very bad, do you think that happens because I play that slot too often?Do you have a list of favorite games on the pragmatic provider?Quote from: masulum on September 15, 2023, 12:06:24 PM~snip~ But I agree with you, if PP is mostly giving maxwin to their players, other games I played is rarely provide maxwin, I think PGsoft is the worse. Because while playing PGS, my biggest win was only 600x.Yes, I agree too. If I look on YouTube, most of the gamblers who get Maxwin come from pragmatic slots. Oh yes, I also sometimes see maxwin from no limit city, but it is very difficult to get bigwin in no limit city

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: It is very difficult to get 5000x the bet and requires a very high level of luck. Even so, some people can get it, but we don't know how much money they have used to gamble until they can get 5000x the bet.What about Forge of Olympus, Big Bass Amazon Extreme, Zeus vs Hades, Gates of Olympus (which is very famous among the others) or others? I had good experiences playing Gates of Olympus and Forge of Olympus, but not big wins. It was just a small win, and maybe that was my break even.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Guys here is the replay for all of you to watch it live.I had posted it in another thread that no one is replying anymore there so here is also for you to enjoy.The first time a game from Reel Kingdom as I said which is a big partner of Pragmatic Play gave me so many free spins,it is 60 or 70 spins max in a game that has very similar game play mechanics like the well known Big Bass series that they make but I think this is better as it has two symbols,one that collects the fish and the other that removes the lowest fish giving you a bit more edge.https://replay.pragmaticplay.net/5WCCCtTQQx

comments.body: Quote from: maydna on September 15, 2023, 12:46:32 PMIt is very difficult to get 5000x the bet and requires a very high level of luck. Even so, some people can get it, but we don't know how much money they have used to gamble until they can get 5000x the bet.If it was easy to get maxwin then the casino would go bankrupt  Yes, that's right, previously I lost continuously until finally I got maxwin, and if I calculated maxwin I couldn't get back the money I lost. comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Quote from: komisariatku on September 15, 2023, 04:26:35 PMQuote from: maydna on September 15, 2023, 12:46:32 PM~snip~If it was easy to get maxwin then the casino would go bankrupt  Yes, that's right, previously I lost continuously until finally I got maxwin, and if I calculated maxwin I couldn't get back the money I lost. I played buffalo king megaways slot continuously because of chasing maxwin, but it was a bad experience because it cost me a lot of money.Correct. But if only I could get it, the casino obviously wouldn't go bankrupt yet I've never had a maxwin, but I'm not trying to catch him. I don't know how many rounds it takes to get the maxwin. That is why you need a lot of luck if you want to get the maxwin. Not many can get it, and only those who are really very lucky can get it.Quote from: komisariatku on September 15, 2023, 04:26:35 PMQuote from: maydna on September 15, 2023, 12:46:32 PM~snip~I used to like playing the Gates of Olympus slot, but now I rarely play it. It's very difficult to get good multiplication. For me, the results are always badI rarely play Gates of Olympus because too many people play it. I prefer slot games that have just been released because they provide a different experience and feel from other slot games that I have played.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Pragmatic Play is always not accessible in our country. It's been a long time since I wanted to experience playing some of PP's casino games without the use of VPN as I don't want to use it in the first place to erase my worries for violating a term related to that.But just recently, or should I say, a few months ago, I was surprised that some fiat online casinos here now list Pragmatic Play as one of their game providers. I don't know the reason why they were able to get eligibility to support the PP games accessed here in the country. Unfortunately, for most crypto-casinos, PP is still not accessible here.If anyone from PH wants to have an experience of playing PP games without the use of a VPN, I can mention what online fiat casinos I'm talking about. I just don't want to share it here since that's not a crypto-gambling site and don't want to make it look like I'm promoting those.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: komisariatku on June 05, 2023, 09:56:47 AM1# What are your favorite slots on PP Games?2# Try to share your biggest wins3# Do you have any special tricks for playing PP?4# How is your experience getting the maxwin and how much money have you spent playing slots?#1 Gates of Olympus, Fruit Party, and Madame Destiny Megaways#2 $3,000 in Madame Destiny Megaways by buying bonus $100,  It was long time ago when I was active in duelbits contest. The most unforgetable thing in this win is that I started playing with $25 only and won more than $3,000#3 No, I play my favorite games only most of the time. #4 4-5 times max win in Gates of Olympus within a week, all win were $1,000 because all with $20 buy bonus. How much I have spent? I'm sure no gambler know how much they have spent on gambling unless a gambler take note everytime they make deposit in casinos.
